The JHtmlTextArea automatically copies data from the internal IFrame to the TEXTAREA based on events.  The problem is that some browsers don't fire the events consistently (for example: The apply color button doesn't always update the TEXTAREA).

A simple solution which works on IE/FF/Chrome is to simply invoke the update to textarea method like this:

    $("#textarea").htmlarea("updateTextArea");
